health_title: How the Shape of Your Ears Affects What You Hear
health_description: We’re able to locate sound because our brains grasp the shape of our ears. When that shape changes, we need time and practice to adapt. Ears are a peculiarly individual piece of anatomy.

art_title: New Contemporary Institute Reverberates in Richmond’s Historic Landscape
art_description: The center, which will open in April, takes a bold look at race and other social issues that still resonate in the region as well as the nation. A new Institute for Contemporary Art is set to open.
